price: 20. Waxaa lagula dhalaaliyaa waxa ku jira uurarkoooda iyo haragga (jirkooda).
arabic: يُصۡهَرُ بِهِۦ مَا فِي بُطُونِهِمۡ وَٱلۡجُلُودُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yuṣ'haru bihi mā fī buṭūnihim wal-julūdu
